hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Ubuntu Chromium/76.0.3809.100 Chrome/76.0.3809.100 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
Upgrade the software on your Beagle

Coming soon!

Visit /about/jkridner to contact Jason to find out why content isn't here yet.

Get connected to the Internet

Update Cloud9 IDE workspace

debian@beaglebone:/var/lib/cloud9$ cd /var/lib/cloud9⏎
debian@beaglebone:/var/lib/cloud9$ git pull⏎
Already up-to-date.
debian@beaglebone:/var/lib/cloud9$

Update the Linux kernel

debian@beaglebone:/var/lib/cloud9$ cd /opt/scripts⏎
debian@beaglebone:/opt/scripts$ git pull⏎
Already up-to-date.
debian@beaglebone:/opt/scripts$ sudo tools/update_kernel.sh⏎
[sudo] password for debian:temppwd⏎
